title: Textile, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 121 x 74.5 cm (47 5/8 x 29 5/16 in.)
description: Isolated scenes within a floral grid; boy with a butterfly net. woman with watering can on a staircase, women at ease in a garden setting and children with a nest of baby birds. In purple and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-342.
